name: CSE199 Final Project
body:
##Welcome to Chang Ho Sung's Final Project web page.
This page is going to mainly introduce the CSE199 course as well as what I have done over the course of semester.

***
##About CSE199
CSE199 course has a purpose that provides an overview of how the internet works by describing everything required to answer a single search query. But, unlike other general courses, CSE199 course provides more interesting and comfortable studying environment. So, I have always been satisfied with this course.

***
##Various ways to learn
###1. Video
This course provides a unique way to study "Video". In my opinion, it's a great way, since people usually have better concentration on watching video than any writings. Thus, "Video" is good teaching method.
###2. Class Activity
Unlike, other boring classes, this course let students do a lot of useful and interesting activity during class, such as creating one's web pages, playing many kinds of games and making something to understand how internet works etc....

***
##Assignments
###1. Watching Video
* It's required to watch videos by due date
 -> [Videos](https://www.internet-class.org/courses/fys/review/) - This is the site of videos(need to log-in) 

###2. Taking Video
CSE199 sets taking video tasks. Since starting point of semester, I have taken three videos based on the provided "Video". In my opinion, it is not only appropriate way to check student whether understood or not understood about the contents of videos, but also, students enable to review that videos easily.
###These are my videos assignments
1. ![First](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/rbegacTW658/default.jpg?sqp=CNiOvsIF&rs=AOn4CLB3nvP22OjB7bAtTD9s6ZaRPfsgLw)[First Video - Basic of Internet Network Structure](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rbegacTW658)
2. ![Second](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ttUq0qBpato/default.jpg?sqp=CNiOvsIF&rs=AOn4CLClvsOSGWcCuqAJRgKwozRu01MAbg)[Second Video - What is URL & URI?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3_KepNJ2jDA)
3. ![Third](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/3_KepNJ2jDA/hqdefault.jpg?custom=true&w=196&h=110&stc=true&jpg444=true&jpgq=90&sp=68&sigh=yQsxrv4yr9FJMjwKfLUW62UGM-0)[Third Video - History and Development of Internet](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3_KepNJ2jDA)

***
##Course Instructors
### Professor Geoffrey Challen
![Instructor](https://photos.smugmug.com/Years/2014/14213-Engineering-Geoffrey/i-fV2nDKL/0/S/3X5A6950-S.jpg)
### Professor Jesse Hartloff
![Instructor](https://i1.rgstatic.net/ii/profile.image/AS%3A279610202836995@1443675675238_l/Jesse_Hartloff.png)

***
##Thoughts for the CSE199
* I'm really happy with the great class. Furthermore, really appreciate instructors and TAs.

***
**Thank you for watching!**

***
